description: Unique identifier for this meter replacement record.
System-generated timestamp when the record was created or processed (yyyymmddHHMMssSSS); used for sequencing and audit.
Time of day (HHMMSS) the meter replacement occurred or was logged.
Calendar date (YYYYMMDD) the meter replacement occurred or was logged.
Free-text description of the meter replacement activity or reason.
Additional technician notes, exceptions, or remarks about the replacement.
Starting reading on the new meter at installation, typically zero.
Reading of the removed meter at time of replacement; likely the final reading before swapâ€”confirm with SME.
Identifier of the equipment/asset whose meter was replaced.
Reference indicator for the equipment foreign key/column (e.g., 'equip'); primarily metadata for integrations; confirm with SME.
Unit or type of meter reading (e.g., miles 'mi', hours 'hr').
Legacy system identifier for the same transaction, for traceability.
Legacy source table name from which this record was migrated.
Work order number associated with executing the meter replacement.
Reference indicator for the work order foreign key/column (e.g., 'woworkd'); primarily metadata; confirm with SME.
